belongs_to_collection.name: The Adventures of Dr. Dolittle Series

original_title: Doktor Dolittle und seine Tiere: Teil 3 – Die Affenkrankheit - In der Höhle des Löwen
overview: Dr. Dolittle has arrived in the land of monkeys, where gorillas, orangutans, baboons and spiders await medical attention. But how can one do it alone? Luckily, the animals of the desert want to help.
title: The Adventures of Dr. Dolittle: Tale 3 - The Lion's Den
